title: lightbit
author: lightbit
created_time: July 06, 2023, 03:07:00 PMLast edit: October 01, 2024, 05:26:49 AM by lightbit
content: For a limited time, we're offering listings at just $10 each! DM me ASAP to reserve your spot. Website: https://cryptopia.in/Listing form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfOg4PeYSHh2VIa6g47-OZejbzPOwJKnBDNoHbxW00hVfUIPg/viewform

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGrizzly on July 06, 2023, 09:50:04 PMIt's a very nice site.Thank you for the kind words! We highly appreciate your support and value your feedback.

comments.author: AVESCOIN
comments.body: [/quote]Excellent web page, one of the best in the crypto world!!

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Quote from: AVESCOIN on July 08, 2023, 02:32:20 AMExcellent web page, one of the best in the crypto world!!Thank you so much! Your kind words mean a lot. I truly appreciate your gratitude and it brings me joy to know that I could be of assistance to you. If you have any more questions or need further support, please don't hesitate to ask. Have a wonderful day! üòäP.S.: AVES is now listed on Cryptopia.in & here's an article about it ‚Äî https://cryptopia.in/aves/

comments.author: edmundduke
comments.body: The project itself looks pretty good but theres also a few issues i found with it. Are you aware that there was an exchange called "Cryptopia" ? They kind of exit-scammed and it affected a lot of people in the crypto space. Its a nice name but yeah, a bit unfortunate.Also the top of the site seems a bit funky. Might want to redesign it. A few balls hide the letters and it seems a bit close to the header.

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Quote from: edmundduke on July 08, 2023, 07:16:12 AMThe project itself looks pretty good but theres also a few issues i found with it. Are you aware that there was an exchange called "Cryptopia" ? They kind of exit-scammed and it affected a lot of people in the crypto space. Its a nice name but yeah, a bit unfortunate.Also the top of the site seems a bit funky. Might want to redesign it. A few balls hide the letters and it seems a bit close to the header.Firstly, I want to express my sincere appreciation for taking the time to provide feedback. I value your insights greatly. Regarding your question, indeed, I am aware of the situation. I also experienced some financial loss on that particular exchange. However, ever since I entered the world of cryptocurrency in 2017, I have been drawn to that name and have desired it. Finally, I stumbled upon an available domain, albeit with a .in TLD, and it brought me great joy to secure it. Therefore, while I am aware of the risks associated with it, we cannot continue to overlook the allure of that enchanting name forever. Moreover, it aligns seamlessly with my platform! "Cryptopia ‚Äî Your Digital Topiary" warmly welcomes every cryptocurrency with open arms.

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Quote from: IMZ Noo Account on July 08, 2023, 07:30:22 AMWhat Edmund said!Answered it above. Cheers.¬† ü•Ç

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Just to refresh your memory, there was an exchange called Cryptopia a few years back. Is there any connection or association with it?

comments.author: lightbit
comments.body: Quote from: royalfestus on July 08, 2023, 04:51:24 PMJust to refresh your memory, there was an exchange called Cryptopia a few years back. Is there any connection or association with it?No. Cryptopia.in, in fact, does not qualify as an exchange. I kindly request you to examine the platform firsthand, and only then will I enthusiastically address any inquiries you may have. I sincerely appreciate your understanding and cooperation. Thank you.

comments.author: uNiT187
comments.body: Cryptopia... Kinda funny choosing this name.

Thanks anyway.I believe that using the exact name of a failed project in the platform's name could deter individuals with experience in the exchange from ever visiting, unless sufficient awareness is generated among potential visitors.
